phrases: Do not come any closer to Nee-san!
Listen to me and your lives will be spared.
You have some gall tricking us!
And you call yourself a Man?!
Elfman and I will draw her away.
Meantime, you grab Lucy and get out of here, Coco.
Thanks to the previous Master, we are being protected from Real Nightmare,
I am sorry for being an inept master!
Do not take offense at every little thing!
What is the status of Kinana's search party?
Well, Fried's runes should hold out for several hours,
but they have not found any trace of her yet.
Is there anything I can do?
The Master should just sit around with gravitas.
I have not seen Romeo lately...
I still thought of him as a rugrat...
I am trying to say he is become a man.
He reminds me of someone I know...
She locks on to the vitals!
Last time, she she took you out with one shot, remember?
The human body is interesting, is not it?
No matter how strong the person,
if you strike their weak spot, they will suffer intense pain and lose control of their body.
Are you really the crybaby, klutzy, gluttonous Michelle?
That was just a performance so I could blend in with the guild.
I am a member of the new Oracion Seis.
Intense pain and losin' control of your body...
My body does not feel pain.
It does not matter what I am hit with, I will never give in.
Likewise, I will not be taken in by any silly emotions.
Then why is your eye like that?
bad guy or not, has a stronger brightness in their eyes.
They do not have a hesitant look in their eye like you do.
I am not hesitant about anything!
This is all for Nee-san's sake!
My heart will not be swayed!
Well, we are not hesitant either!
the only way to save Lucy is by wipin' the floor with you!
So I am going to go all out!
That does not feel hot at all!
My cilice brings pain to any and all vulnerable spots!
Brilliant Flame of the Fire Dragon!
I do not follow such thoughtless things as duty.
I follow my own heart and decide what to do.
It is exactly because my heart aches that I have such strong feelings.
And no one can beat the power of my feelings.
At this rate, Samuel will kill...
He will not be able to find her so easily.
Legion wants to stop the Infinity Clock just as much as we do.
After getting to the bottom of the truth, is that the answer you arrived at, Sammy?
That is the decision he made.
His viewpoint is different from ours.
You are brothers, are not you?
I have no memory of becoming his big brother!
This is not a duty or a calculation...
It has nothing to do with Exceeds or humans or guilds or the church...
What is important is what I am doing for whose sake...
For that sake, I have no other choice, Nii-san!
Actually, we have finished deciphering it.
You know how to stop Real Nightmare?
It seems the only way is by erasing the carved seals on the Infinity Clock,
So he is backed up by evidence.
Happy did an outstanding job this time around.
Grim Reaper and Racer have been defeated.
If those four are beaten, Lu-chan will be saved!
Actually, knowing that, all we need now is action.
Natsu and the others will definitely...
Ultra-vibrations that shake the very air.
They instantly shatter any blade, no matter how skilled the swordsman.
Can you hear what I am thinking?
All I can hear is that you are going to beat me.
Right now, those are the only words in my head.
I can hear your impatience at trying to bring me down.
For someone who can manipulate sound, you sure yap a lot.
But I can hear voices, too.
It is the voices of my friends...
It is a delusion, based on what you wish to happen.
Even if that is true, I do not care.
But I always hear the voices of my friends in my head.
They are my inspiration and the wellspring of my strength.
Do not you hear any voices in your head?
Your words grate on my ears.
You must have gone through a painful experience at the Tower of Heaven, too.
Why are you trying to make innocent people suffer the same way?
You are referring to Real Nightmare?
To be honest, I do not give a damn.
But I lost my friend, while you are surrounded by them.
Come out of the shadows and into the sunlight.
When you look at things that way, your feelings will change naturally!
As if you know anything about me...
Why are you taking your clothes off?
Last time, you knocked me for a loop, but this time is going to be different.
I hate men who are persistent.
I got no interest in belting women,
but I am going to hit you with everything I have got.
So Happy was right on the money, huh?
If all of the members of the new Oracion Seis are defeated,
the engraved seals will disappear and they will lose ownership.
And with no one to control the Infinity Clock,
Jean-Luc thinks that if the seals are wiped out, Lucy will be released.
It feels like the sky is in turmoil...
Maybe with two out of the six members' seals gone,
the effects of Real Nightmare have weakened.
It somehow feels like the Infinity Clock is struggling to protect the engraved seals.
It seems that your angel went back home to heaven in a hurry.
What the hell are you doing?!
My wish is to disappear into the sky, like an angel...
Come on, send me to the sky like the angel.
This scythe is the scythe of Death himself.
If my wish cannot come true, I will destroy you!
The Legion's number one lancer, Dan Straight, is here!
That shyness of yours is such a turn-on.
Do not get between two people who are in love!
I am jealous of you for getting to be alone with Ange-myu!
You know what situation Lucy's in right now, do not you?!
Natsu and Coco will do something to get my old girlfriend out of a pinch.
Gray has given the two of us his blessing!
Now there is nothing between us!
Come on, let us go on our honeymoon!
Is that what you call divine punishment?
Barbarous... boorish... with not even a shred of intelligence!
I know what you are doing.
I summon Raguel, the angel who blows the horn at the end of the world!
I will not reward you with that blessing.
Better to leave you a wounded, squirming, pathetic wreck!
I will show you how I can stop the attack!
This is... a scream... from your heart!
Th-This is a form of love, too...
That man lacks beauty and intelligence.
He is not even worth wiping out.
Do not talk like you are so high and mighty.
Disappear into the sky, you say...
You who are alive right now, what the hell are you?!
It is probably better to call me a girl who dreams of becoming an angel.
But if I keep thinking about it constantly, I will metamorphose into an angel!
From a girl's fancy to a true angel...
is a miraculous magic that will wash away all of my sins with holy light!
The sin of being born human.
That is the sacrifice I have to make for becoming an angel myself.
The more angel power I wield, the more ugliness I can see in the human world.
This world is only about people with conflicting desires crashing into each other!
My wish is to vanish into the sky, like an angel...
I want to announce it to this filthy world, then leave...
Even though you are alive, you are dead.
What sin are you talking about?
The guy gets crushes at the drop of a hat,
but he is honest with himself and lives with all his might!
My comrades are the same way!
In this world, they laugh, get angry, and cry with all their strength...
But even so, they have not gotten nearly enough!
Have you lived enough, to the point where it is okay to fade away?!
So you want nothing more to do with this world,
call it ugly and dirty, as if you would know?!
To me, it sounds like nothing more than the ramblings of some brat pretending to be an angel!
You do not need to go to all the trouble of disappearing.
You are as good as gone right now!
Slice the fool to ugly ribbons!
You have been swallowed up by your own magic!
At this rate, you are going to be murdered by this angel you love so much!
The stronger the magic, the more it tends to choose its user!
But if the wizard's mind is weak, the magic will take over and destroy them!
My feelings are stronger than anyone's!
Is this what your much-admired angels are supposed to look like?!
This thing are not going to take you to any blue skies!
It will drag you down into a pit of darkness!
This is the true form of the magic you got a hold of!
It is feeding off of your life just so it can propagate!
It is what you are right now!
You are a human who is alive right now!
You will be gone for good!
Is this what you wished for, to be sucked up by this blob of flesh?!
Do not lose to any magic!
N-No... I do not want to disappear!
I do not want to disappear...
At the same time you destroyed the angel, Gray...
This way, the lifespan you paid out...
Why would you go that far for me, your enemy?
Well, there is no deep meaning to it...
Letting you wink out of existence like that would have left a bad taste in my mouth.
You are already back to your old personality!
That way of speaking is cute, too!
One of the engraved seals has disappeared.
You can hear me, cannot you?!
I swear I will get you outta here!
There are three members of Oracion Seis left.
We will mow'them all down at once!
That is what you say, but you are the one who is been the human punching bag through all this.
This is not the time or place to be sayin' that!
Well, after all, you have not been able to lift a finger against Michelle.
I-I am not good with that kind of attack!
I got no retort for that!
Next time: I Can Hear the Voices of My Friends!
But y'know, it feels like Michelle is not puttin' her whole heart into those attacks...
Someone who is getting his butt handed to him has no call saying that.
